channel.title: Docker on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Blog

item.title: Docker Compose
item.description: Install sudo curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/v2.2.3/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose docker-compose --version Build & run Docker-compose docker-compose up --build Get running docker compose folder docker inspect <container-name> | grep "com.docker.compose.project.working_dir"
